Error localizando cadena parametrizada: Error locating parameterized string. Could not replace parameter '$ 0' in string '$ 1'.
no_possible: It was not possible to send the invoice, try again later or contact us.
No se ha encontrado el cupon solicitado: The requested coupon was not found
El cupon ya no es esta disponible: The coupon is no longer available
Ha llegado al màximo uso de este cupón: You have reached the maximum use of this coupon
Error en el pago, no se ha encontrado el: Payment failed, payment type not found
ya_existe_el_cliente: Oops! It seems that there is already a user registered with this e-mail, try another e-mail or retrieve your password in Forget your password , on the login page.
Debe indicar una dirección de correo vál: You must enter a valid email address for the 'email' field.
Lo sentimos, este correo electrónico no: Sorry, this email does not exist in our database.
No tiene autorización para restaurar la: You are not authorized to restore the password.
Esta petición para restaurar la contrase: This request to restore the password has expired.
Compruebe su correo para validar el regi: Check your email to validate the registration, thanks.
Este código de sesión no es correcto: This session code is not correct.
Si desas cambiar la contraseña, accede a: If you want to change the password, access from the Menu-> My Account-> My Data.
